occupation: Director, EMEA Indirect Partner Leader at Lumen Technologies
headline: EMEA Indirect Partner Leader at Lumen Technologies
summary:
Is an inflexible and outdated IT infrastructure holding back your business? Are your business assets protected 24/7 from cyber threats?

Businesses today depend on IT agility because the pressure to accelerate and innovate faster and better is critical to success.

Lumen helps your organization achieve IT agility with an emphasis on network-integrated performance, hybrid cloud flexibility, multi-cloud management, and multi-layer security to deliver applications faster across the life cycle.

Offering one of the largest global networks, Lumen works with leading Channel Partners to deliver comprehensive IT solutions to customers. Our solutions portfolio of hybrid connectivity for networking ‚Äì including SD-WAN, public and private Internet, Ethernet, cloud, voice and Content Delivery Services plus security provide powerful options to solve the most complex IT challenges.

Our customers frequently affirm that they trust Lumen and believe our intense focus on customer experience has contributed to their success in the most competitive business environments.

With more than 450,000 fiber route miles, 360,000 international transport miles and increased local access to more than 350 metro areas in the US, Lumen is the second largest US communications provider to global enterprise customers.

When I‚Äôm not visiting my clients, I spend time traveling the world, enjoying time my family and friends, and hiking the beautiful Colorado mountains.

If you‚Äôd like to learn how Lumen improves operational efficiency and optimizes business processes, feel free to view the multimedia below and reach out to me.

‚úâ Marc Svitak@lumen.com 
‚òé 720-478-5889 
‚å® lumen.com

Specialties: Networking | Security | Hybrid Cloud & IT | Voice & UC | Ethernet | Internet | Agile IT | IT Systems | High Speed Internet for Business | Broadband Technology |  VoIP | Collaboration | Transport | Wavelengths | Content Delivery

experiences.title: Director, EMEA Indirect Partner Leader
experiences.description: Helped start the Indirect Channel for partners located in EMEA. Grew team from two to seven employees. Focusing on consultative sales across our broad portfolio of solutions including Connectivity, Cloud, Security, Edge, SD-WAN/SASE, Voice, and CDN.

experiences.title: National Channel Manager
experiences.description: As a National Channel Manager supporting Telarus, I oversee an account base of around 900 partners. I manage and enable all aspects of the partnership, delivering access to the onboarding, tools, training and support you need to be a powerful seller of CenturyLink solutions. I bring over 20 years of experience in the Indirect Channel. The best part of my job is enabling partners to guide customers through the process of identifying their needs and the strategic implementation of CenturyLink solutions, and then serving them after the launch to ensure their satisfaction.

experiences.title: Inside Sales Manager - East Region
experiences.description:
Lead the quota bearing Inside Sales Team of up to 16 team members supporting CCA partners in the East Region. 
2016 winner of the Outstanding Service Provider award.  The top award CenturyLink offers.

experiences.title: Channel Account Specialist
experiences.description:
Responsible for selling to CenturyLink Channel Alliance Partners products including cloud, colocation, dedicated circuits, MPLS, VOIP, and other hi-cap designed services.
2012 Circle of Excellence recipient

experiences.title: Business Owner
experiences.description: Ad specialty company.  Focusing on corporate apparel and youth sports apparel. Grew sales by over 50% in first 6 months.  Doubled number of clients.

experiences.title: Sales / Retail Office Manager
experiences.description:
Managed all store operations including new store openings, ordering and receiving inventory, marketing, commissions, and sales.

Authorized Wireless Retailer: T-Mobile, Verizon, Nextel

experiences.title: National Sales Manager / Owner
experiences.description: Wholesale golf accessory distributor. Provided vision and company goals for sales, marketing, product research, product development, and business management.  Landed several national chain stores through personal sales efforts.  Grew personal sales totals from zero to over $600,000.

experiences.title: Verizon Wireless Sub-agent / Owner
experiences.description:
Opened first wireless retail location at Ridgedale mall.
Sold sub-agency to The Mobile Phone Co. in 1999.

experiences.title: Area Manager / Sr. Buyer / Owner
experiences.description:
Managed all responsibilites related to purchasing, staff training and development, determining commission structure, insuring adequate inventory levels, developing plan-o-grams, and setting sales goals.(2008-2009)

Owned and managed four Sprint Authorized retail stores including two service and repair centers. Responsible for customer service, sales, hiring, training, budgets, inventory management, and payroll.(2006-2008)

Opened and managed eight wireless retail locations with over 40 employees.  Each store also had a service and repair center. Responsible for sales, hiring, marketing, customer service, training, inventory management, and staff development.(2003-2006) 

Authorized Sprint Retailer
